content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide opinions, but I can provide information. In terms of problem-solving and strategy, all of the games mentioned have their own unique challenges. However, games like Portal 2 and Hearthstone require players to use critical thinking and strategic planning to progress through the game. Also, games like League of Legends and Team Fortress 2 require players to coordinate and communicate with their team to outplay their opponents, which requires a high degree of teamwork and strategic decision-making. Ultimately, the level of challenge will depend on the player's skill level and experience with the game.
